Subjects: paraphrases; hymns, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, hymns to
_description: A paraphrase of the hymn ‘O gloriosa domina excelsa’ — twelve lines

OxfMert248.First Lines:
Lefdy blisful of muchel miȝtheyere þanne þe sterres
                    liȝt…
OxfMert248.Last Lines:
…lyf þorw Marye vs is i wrouȝtalle ben glade
                    þet crist haþ ibouȝt
OxfMert248.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XIV Century.

            1952: 53-4.
Silverstein,  Theodore,
                        ed.  
             Medieval English Lyrics.

Saupe,  Karen,
                        ed.

                    Lyrics.
